segments.text: [speaking in hindi ] hello.
good afternoon, sir, <PII_NAME> here from lendingclub, p2p lending.
[speaking in hindi ] sir, may i speak in hindi?
yes sir, please speak in hindi.
sir, i am talking to <PII_NAME> ji.
yes sir, you have created an account in lending club, right?
that's why there is a call.
yes, you can know some query questions.
started your lending in the club.
it's been a long time since i started it, so the call was related to that, that's why there was a call.
wanted to know if you have any query questions related to investments.
no, no, there are no questions.
you created the account on april 7th.
if you have any query questions, you can reach out to this number.
you can know about the platform from where you can know.
friends had come to know through friends, sorry friends had come to know but keep coming etc.
ok, your friends have also done lending investments.
yes, your friends have also invested.
it is done, ok, you can share your friend's number.
i cannot share the number like this, i ask them.
ok, ask them and let me know if they have referred, then we will add your account as a referral to them.
ok ok sir thank you.
ok sir.
